question: Indian Prime Minister would join the 50th Independence Day celebration of which country?
explanation:
Bangladesh has invited Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi to join the celebrations of the 50 years of the country's independence, which would be celebrated on March 2021.
Bangladesh would be one among the few foreign destinations which PM Modi would visit post COVID-19 outbreak. The visit would be preceded by a virtual summit between the two Prime Ministers in December.
